Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class CommandLineInterface

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observers.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CommandLineInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class CommandLineInterface extends ViewObservable implements View
This class offers a User Interface via terminal. It is an implementation of the View.

    • init

      This method shows the client the Eriantys logo and starts the method chain to connect to the server.

      Specified by:

    • askNickname

      public void askNickname()
      Asks the client which nickname they want to use. If it is unique, the client joins the lobby; otherwise, they are asked to choose a different nickname.
      Specified by:
      askNickname in interface View

    • askCreateOrJoin

      Specified by:
      askGameInfo in interface View

    • askGameNumber

      public void askGameNumber()
      Asks the client the gameID (which must be unique). If it is unique a new game is created, else they are asked to choose a different gameID.
      Specified by:
      askGameNumber in interface View

    • askWizardID

      public void askWizardID()
      Asks the client which WizardID they want to choose (must be unique). If it is unique the client is added to the game, else they are asked to choose a different Wizard.
      Specified by:
      askWizardID in interface View

      Parameters:
